Name: inbento
About the game: inbento is a food-themed puzzle game where you prepare lunch boxes while enjoying a heartwarming story about parenthood. Master tricky mechanics, solve hand-crafted recipes, explore tiny vignettes and enjoy this culinary brain-teaser from the creators of Golf Peaks! * 1st place in The Big Indie Pitch @ PGA 2019 * FEATURES: 120+ puzzles unique pattern-matching gameplay heartwarming story about parenthood cute cats!!! inspired by Japanese aesthetics and bento cuisine
Meta Title: inbento: Jul 30, 2021, Afterburn and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on inbento? Check out the release date (Jul 30, 2021), developer insights from Afterburn, and a complete game summary.
